table_description: Secrets are encrypted environment variables that you create in a repository

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that contains the secrets.

columns.name: selected_repositories_url
columns.description: The GitHub URL of the repository.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Time when the secret was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Time when the secret was updated.
